Method Detail

dialogClose

public void dialogClose(Login login)
Callback method called when the Login window closes Creates a ClientOperator with the info from Login window. Sends the initial logon request to the server.

Parameters:
login - The Login window that contains server IP and team name information

initializeConnection

public ClientMessages initializeConnection(java.lang.String ip)
Create the connection with the server at the given IP Set serverSock to hold the ClientMessages socket object

Parameters:
ip - Location of the OEG server.
Returns:
True if connection is successful.

public void actionPerformed(java.awt.event.ActionEvent e)

actionPerformed in interface java.awt.event.ActionListener

updateDisplay

void updateDisplay()
Update the displayed time in the UI. This method is called from actionPerformed() which is itself invoked by the timer.

void resume()

showResult

public void showResult(java.lang.String result)
Show a string in the history window of the GUI

Parameters:
result - The string to be displayed

setIP

public void setIP(java.lang.String ip)
Display the location that the applet is connected to in the GUI.

Parameters:
ip - Network location of the server.
